Title: Why "AI spam" should be a teaching moment
Author: GitHub
Description:
AI-generated spam in issues and pull requests is a growing challenge for maintainers. In this clip from The GitHub Podcast, our hosts discuss how to approach this problem not just by closing issues, but by setting guidance and turning it into a "teaching moment" for new contributors.

#AI #OpenSource #GitHub
